PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Need an alternative to Sync?
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Choose Internxt for full security for your files and personal data

descriptions: Without open source code or audits, you canâ€™t be sure how Sync handles your data or if security vulnerabilities exist. Internxt is fully open source and audited for peace of mind.
Sync offers basic cloud storage and backups. Internxtâ€™s suite includes Antivirus, VPN, Cleaner, Meet, and Mail, all designed to protect you from Big Tech.
Sync uses traditional algorithms like AES-256 and RSA-2048. Without PQE, user data might not stay safe against the future impact of quantum computing.
Sync is based in Canada and subject to Canadian laws. Internxt is based in the EU (Spain), following the world's strictest privacy regulations like GDPR.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why choose Internxt as your alternative to Sync
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: Get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption and a full product suite to protect you online.

descriptions: Internxt is the first cloud storage with post-quantum encryption, protecting you against threats that can break standard industry encryption.
Beyond cloud storage, Internxt offers a full suite (VPN, Antivirus, Meet) to keep your devices and online presence private and secure.
Internxt lifetime plans remove recurring fees, giving you long-term access with a one-time payment, something Sync does not offer.

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private alternative to Sync?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files.
Sync manages the encryption keys on its own servers, meaning it could potentially access your files or be required to give access to government authorities.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption used by Sync, post-quantum encryption (PQE) algorithms are built to resist attacks from powerful quantum computers.
This ensures that your data remains safe against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all Internxt plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant solution that follows strict EU laws to ensure your privacy is protected.

faq.question: Is Sync more expensive than Internxt?
answer: With your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, Internxt plans are cheaper than Syncâ€™s current pricing, with the added benefit of many more features.
Also, Internxt offers lifetime plans to avoid subscription costs forever, which Sync does not offer.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to assist you with any questions.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from your settings or purchase a new one to have your storage automatically stacked.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt accepts debit/credit cards, PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
